publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4694 Mike Pringle: New Adult Education Programme—That the Parliament congratulates the City of Edinburgh Council on the launch of its new adult education programme comprising hundreds of day, evening and weekend courses; welcomes the accessibility of the prospectus in libraries, council buildings, GP surgeries and some bookshops; applauds the clarity of the council’s online information and booking system, and wishes the citizens of Edinburgh enjoyment and success with the development of their academic and recreational skills.
